ovdesc.p: Mapping table is used for Error Response Handling, during deployment from Desing Studio.

Maps the application field name and respective DSL name, that are retrieved, everytime an error is raised on an application field. The errors should be sent back to Design Studio with its respective DSL name.

desc.p: Specifies the description of DSL mapping.
Specifies the Label name used by the application model, in Design Studio, which is equivalent to the field names of corresponding application in t24.

p.p: Mandatory input only when the APPLN.FIELD.NAME is specified.

desc.p: Unique reference to indentify mapping table for different type of installers.

p.p: Allowed values are: VERSION, ENQUIRYand LOCAL.TABLE (Installer types applicable for respective applications)
